title: Error connecting with Maestro when trying to log in
body:
Recently I've been having an error connecting with Maestro whenever I get past the patcher and I try and log in to league of legends. I began getting this error a couple days ago and I can seem to bypass it by restarting my computer, but if I close the client or if the client or if the client closes, I have to restart my computer again. Another thing that I notice is that the alpha client still works, so it seems to being something with just the adobe air client.

I've tried repairing the client, deleting the files and reinstalling them, and I've also reinstalled it on both of my storage drives. The error also happens on the PBE client, again hinting that there's something happening with my adobe air client.

Any help or suggestions would be welcome, or other people having the same problem as me.

If they matter, my system specs are:
Windows 10-64 Bit
Intel i7 4770k
16GB DDR3 @ 1600MHz
Nvidia GTX 970
1TB HDD
128 GB SSD

replies.body:
Maestro errors indicate that there's an issue with your connection reaching our servers. I suggest checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps that commonly resolve these problems.

Let me know if that guide helped in resolving this.
